definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The elaborate design of grave goods, such as this wine container, signaled status.
sentences.chinese: 像这个酒器之类的设计精致的随葬品是地位的象征。

sentences.english: Many exquisite funerary objects were extracted from this grave.
sentences.chinese: 这个古墓里出土了很多精美的随葬品。

sentences.english: The ancient books and articles in the tombs unearthed in Turpan have proved this historical fact.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番出土的文书和随葬品充分证明了这一历史史实。

sentences.english: Gold wreaths are rare and were buried with ancient nobles or royalty.
sentences.chinese: 这些珍稀的金器是古代帝王或其皇族的随葬品。

definition: funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
